channel.title: goal on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in goal on Barefoot Rob

item.title: today's goal
item.description: 11:18 Wednesday 27 July 2016 JST 1 page on why, what, and how oh my goodness this is embarassing to write on my online journal. Fortunately I only have 1 reader, and he’s probably gotten bored and wandered away. I know for a fact that I won’t keep this up every day, but the why is currently related to productivity, which is related to thinking I did something good, which is related to thinking that I’m good.
